title: Certificate Request
html:
Home » Services » Insurance » Certificate Request

Certificate Request

Please complete this form in full, including location details. Incomplete submissions may delay your insurance certificate request.

The person requesting certificates must be authorized on file with our office.

Use the legal name shown on your policy.

Coverage Needed *

Please select at least one coverage option.

Event Details

Include event name, activities, and any sports/athletics sponsored.

Event Frequency
Recurring events may require an endorsement. Contact 1-866-662-8210 if needed.
Certificate Holder
The certificate holder is the organization/entity requesting proof of your insurance, not your church or organization.

Deliver to Certificate Holder By:
Additional Insured Wording Required by Contract
Located on the contract or communicated by the certificate holder. Examples: officers, officials, agents, board members, volunteers, servants.

Please note: There may be an additional charge for Additional Insured endorsement. If so, you will be contacted for authorization.

Is Additional Insured a requirement of the certificate holder? *
Only select Yes if required by the certificate holder/contract.

Upload any special wording/higher limit requirements, or send to cert@agfinancial.org.

Dev: Disable required fields

Thank you.

We’ll be in touch soon.
